title: Silver/Gold Player Looking for 5's team
body:
I play a lot of nights and late nights but I am on all days on my days off. I was gold, in my series to get back into gold( Wish me luck, first game was awful support took all my kills 5-1 in lane). Anyways. I main ADC, but can fill any role well except maybe top. But I play a lot of champs.

ADC (Main) - Jinx, Lucian, Corki, Sivir, Vayne, Ezreal, Draven, Kalista
Mid - Xerath, Ahri, Twisted Fate, Ezreal (AD), Varus
Support - Thresh, Braum, Taric, Leona, Janna, Alistar, Morg, Nautilus
Jungle - Udyr, Xin Zhao, Gragas, Hecarim, Jarvan IV, Vi
Top (Weakest) - Nasus, Shen, Maokai, Nautilus, Quinn 

I mostly play tanks top, but I would like to see what I can get from team invites. I will be back in gold by tonight. Hit me up or add me in game!

replies.body:
I would love to have you. I have a team with like 3-4 players who can consistently play, and are in serious need of an add.
I will try to add you, and if you would like to join you can just accept and we can get playing sometime soon. Thank You
Bumping up again. Gold III now. Want to play with a team!
